name: BIRD LORD
description:
Climb to the top.

Collect feathers to upgrade your jumps.

Collect mystical soul orbs to help with your journey.

Left Click / Left Trigger for charging your claw and dashing + slowing down time while slashing at stuff

Right Click / Right Trigger for firing energy bolts once collected from downed enemies and possible places (spinning orbs around hand indicate ammo)

(need to slash twice at prison bars to break them)

NEED A XBOX 360 CONTROLLER. Have keyboard support but theres no way of switching between them in-game right now

Try to reach the top, and do have fun performing sweet action sequences.
